name: ReadHyperdbTableRecords
description:
Retrieve records from a specified HyperDB table.

Use this tool to fetch records from a HyperDB table by specifying the enterprise account ID and data table ID. Ideal for accessing or reviewing data stored in HyperDB tables.

parameters.name: enterprise_account_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the enterprise account. Required to access records from the specified HyperDB table.

parameters.name: data_table_id
parameters.description: The identifier of the HyperDB table from which records are to be retrieved. It is required to specify the correct table ID to access the corresponding data.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A string representing the position within the dataset to start retrieving records from. Use for paginated data retrieval.

parameters.name: fields_to_retrieve
parameters.description: List of field names to retrieve from the HyperDB table records. Specify as an array of strings.

parameters.name: maximum_records_to_retrieve
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve from the HyperDB table. Specify an integer value to limit the number of records returned.

parameters.name: primary_keys_to_retrieve
parameters.description: An array of primary key strings to specify which records to retrieve from the HyperDB table.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the airtable API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
